wikipedia.title: Mama Said Knock You Out
wikipedia.extract: Mama Said Knock You Out is the fourth studio album by American rapper LL Cool J. It was produced mostly by Marley Marl and recorded at his "House of Hits" home studio in Chestnut Ridge and at Chung King House of Metal in New York City. After the disappointing reception of LL Cool's 1989 album Walking with a Panther, Mama Said Knock You Out was released by Def Jam Recordings on August 28, 1990 to commercial and critical success.

opinions.details: 歌是受Cool J奶奶启发写的，MV最后他的奶奶也说话了，所以究竟这个“mama”实质上是不是指“mamma/奶奶”？因为在google里也搜到有少数网页上写的是“mamma said knock you out”
black culture里面管妇女都叫mama，这歌基本是炫耀自己rap多牛逼，可能选择mama也是为了听起来更直接

是奶奶，
奶奶让我干翻你们 
（是你们，他攻击了一大片）
